text: Wazawai wa, kare-ra ga jibun no tamashi o utta koto ni aru. Kare-ra ga arra no kudasa reta keiten o shinjinai no wa, arra ga yoi to sa reta shimo be (muhanmado) ni, kudasa reta onkei o sonemu tamedearu. Sore de kare-ra wa, kare no ikari no ue ni ikari o maneita. Fushinjin-sha wa hazubeki chobatsu o ukerudearou
